targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  component AS metric,
  utilisation
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'cpu'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  component AS metric,
  utilisation
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'ram'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  rentals_bid AS "Bid",
  rentals_on_demand AS "On Demand",
  rentals_stored AS "Stored"
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(time,1s),
  component AS metric,
  sum(utilisation) AS "network_bandwith"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'network'
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY $__unixEpochGroup(time,1s)

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(time,1s),
  sum(power_consumption) AS "power_consumption"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__unixEpochGroup(time,1s)

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  account_credit
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  account_credit
FROM machine
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  component AS metric,
  utilisation AS "Disk usage"
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'disk_usage'
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY $__unixEpochGroup(time,$__interval)

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  component AS metric,
  utilisation
FROM hardware
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  component = 'disk_space'
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 1"
FROM instance
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time) AND
  instance_id = 1
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  earning AS "GPU 2"
FROM instance
WHERE

  instance_id = 2
ORDER BY time

ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",

WHERE

  instance_id = 0
ORDER BY time
